item.title: With 'Baby Botox,' young adults strive to keep wrinkles from ever forming
item.description: A growing number of 20-somethings are trying to freeze time with preventative Botox treatments. Here's what's behind the trend.

item.title: 'We still need to be treated as a person': Senior living homes rethink dementia care
item.description: In some senior living communities, people with dementia are within the general community -- not in a locked ward. It works well for some people.
